Scales > Grimoire

This information is based on the list of projects analysed for the Eclipse Foundation dashboard: dashboard.eclipse.org. This represents a lot of data:

  • 471 Git repositories,
  • 175 mailing lists,
  • 197 ticketing trackers.

Thresholds

The initial set of thresholds for metrics in Grimoire is the following:

Note: All of the Git repositories with no activity during the last month have been removed in the calculation of thresholds. From the original set, only 152/172 projects contained activity.
  • Number of commits (SCM_COMMITS_1M)
    [0.025078279624, 0.0756446929809, 0.264255236791, 2.54688585321]
  • Number of committers (SCM_COMMITTERS_1M)
    [0.00869816603364, 0.0242054327998, 0.0757305045383, 1.47492625369]
  • Number of committed files (SCM_COMMITTED_FILES_1M)
    [0.069052601156, 0.294543274794, 0.948385435841, 38.8978930308]
  • SCM Stability (SCM_STABILITY_1M)
    [1.0, 1.14285714286, 1.4430952381, 3.79487179487]

Discussion

In order to make those metrics relative according to the first version of the maturity model, the lines of code were retrieved with an ad-hoc script. Those were based on the 471 Git repositories already mentioned. All metrics are made relative using thousands of lines of code (KSLOC).
